notesStmt.note: This text does not constitute a critical edition but rather a collation of the then accessible text witnesses with sporadic editorial remarks; however, the lemma choice of the critical edition of the first chapter in Steiner 2010 has been incorporated where it is pertaining to the Tibetan text.

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Tibetan texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the Wylie Transliteration in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

table.head: Characters Used for the Transliteration of Tibetan according to Wylie

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the resp attribute identifying the agency.

refsDecl.p:
A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of
a pragmatic abbreviation of the title: Buddhacarita (Tibetan) = BCt,
the number of the chapter (le'u) in arabic numerals,
the number of the verse in arabic numerals.

'di yis
mchog rab kun nas rnyedrnyed/rnyadrnyad par dka' ba yi
dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni rnam par 'byed par 'gyur
rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyiskyi yongsyangs dkrisbkris shing
sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i
'jig rten rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyesrnyed nas kyang
chos kyi rgyal po 'dis ni'di-sni 'ching ba mtharmthar mdzadmdzad mdzad 'gyur
rmongssmongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung
'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa
mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de mya ngan bya ba'i gnasgnas
de phyir khyedkhyod nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig
yon tan rgya mtsho 'di las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni
bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de

de yi dam chos ma thos pa
lasla kho bo ni
mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun tshogs med pa snyam
de ltar don thos bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas
yid mi bde ba dor nas mi dbang dgar gyur la
rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes
des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsamsbsam
'phags pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes
bsam pa'i rnam par gzungbzung bya snying la byas gyur te
nges par 'di ni mima sdug chos kyi phyogs min la
rigs rgyudbrgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jigs'jiḍ pa mthong
de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la
bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas sunasu (4)
gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni
rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs par gyur
blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nas ni
thub pa'i gsung mnyanmnyam pa dang de yide'i lugs la ni
rnam mang rjes surjesu brtse ba yis niyis niyis na/niyin nayin nas legs pa des
sdug pa'ipa bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug
sras po skyes pas tshim pa'ipa'i mi yi bdag po yang

yul la song ba'i
'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te
sras kyi yid 'ong sras popa bltams pa'i las dag ni
rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed du bcug

zhag bcu yongs suyongsu 'das'ongs'ongs par
gyur pa nyid kyi tshe
mchog gi dga' ba rab ldan snyomsbsnyoms par gyur pa'i yidpa yis
sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lha yi mchod pa ni
bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas

gzhan yang brgya dang stong
phrag yongs suyongsu gang ba'i grangs
brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyu rwardwar bcas shinggyis
rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min 'oswasaso ma ldan pa'i ba
rang gi sras 'phel phyir na gnyis skyes rnams la byin

div.note: auch hier hat man das subskribierte -w- in DT manipuliert

lg.l: de nas snyomsbsnyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul
rang sems tshim par byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas
yon tan ldan zhingshing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na
grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad
de nas mche gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che
dkar poom. dkar po'i me tog gis spras nor bu'i sgron
khri la dge ba'i phyir ni*na lha mo sras ldan ma
lha rnams la ni rab tu btud nas bsnyenbsnyan par gyur
de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang'brangs sras mgon ma
bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas
mchodmchdmched ldan lha nani lha rnamsrnams (4) kyis ni brgya byin bzhin
mi bdag nyid kyang grong pa'i tshogs kyis gshegs par gyur
de nas gdong drug skyes pas yid chesyi chedyis ched dbang phyug bzhin

shākya'i
rgyal pos grong khyer rnam par khyab mdzad de
zhal ni dga' bas rab gang 'di dang 'di zhes pa'i
srid 'phel rgyas pa dang ni grags dang snyan pa mdzad
de nas mi yi bdag po'i sras bltams cher skyes pas
ser skya zhes pa'i grong khyer ljongs dang bcas pa de
gnod sbyin grong *nina phun tshogs 'dod pa skyes pa na

lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bkram bzhin
dga' bar gyur

div.p: | sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngagsngag chen po las | gzhon nu sku bltams pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ||

lg.l: skye dang rga ba *mtharmthongmthang song bdag skyes bdag pham de'i
skyes pa nas brtsams mi *nyinnyid nyi mas rgyal po deste

chu yi shugs rnamsrnams
kyis ni chu bo sin dhusi-ndhu bzhin
nor dangdardang? glang po rta dang bshes rnams 'phel bar gyur
nornar rnams dang ni rin po chepoe dang bzang po'i gser
de dang de ni byas dang ma byas pa nyid kyang
yid la re ba yi rang bzhin duom. khur gyur pa
de la gcig tu phan pa'i cha shas gter rnyed gyur

div.note: beide Vokalzeichen -o und -e über pa

lg.l: gang zhig padma dang mtshungsmtshangs gnyis 'thung rnams kyis kyang
dkyil 'khor 'di la nye bar 'ong bar'ongs par mi nus pa'i
gangsgang dang ldan pa'i glang chen chang gis dregs de rnams
'bad pa las kyang gzhanbzhan du de la nye bar gnas
sna tshogs mtshanmchan mas mtshanmchan zhing gsar ba'ipa'i gser sga dang
de bzhin gzhan rnams dag gis brgyanrgyan byas rngog ma 'phyang'chang
stobs dang byams pa dang ni nor gyis thob pa yi
'di yi mgyogs 'gro rnams kyiskyi grong khyer phye mar byas
de bzhin 'di yi yul 'khor du ni tshim dang rgyas
legslags *mala rdul ldan yon tan ldan pa'o mar ldan
rab mchog be'u rnams dang bcas pa'i ba rnams ni
'o ma mang po 'jo ba mang po byungbyunggyung? bar gyur
'di yi dgra boba dbus gnas nyid du song gyur pa
dbus gnas gyur pa mdza' bshes nyid du rab tu song
khyad par du ni bshes gnyen brtan por song ba ste

'di yi phyogs
dag gnyis te dgra yang yod ma yin
de bzhin du ni 'di yi 'jam rlung 'brug gi sgra
glog gi 'phreng'phrangphreng ba 'khyil ba yis ni brgyan pa'i sprin
rdo char dang ni thog lhung nyes pa rnams kyis gzhan
yul du dus la lha yis char pa phab par gyur
zhing gi las kyikyis ngal dub byed pa nyung ngus kyang
'bru ni 'bras bu ldan pa dus sbyor bzhin skyes te
de rnams nyid kyang 'di yi sman du byung gyur la
bcud dang snying po yis kyang mngon par lhag pa nyid
g.yul du rab tu zhugs la kun tudu 'joms'joms pa bzhin
lus la the tshom za bar byed pa'i dus na yang
rab bzhin gnas shing bde ba nyid du nad med par
dus kyi dbang gis mi mo rnams ni rab tu btsas
brtul zhugs ldanlan rnams mama/mra gtogs nor rdzas dman na yang
mi rnams pha rol rnams las don du gnyer mi byed
mngon par don du gnyer la 'phags pa nor 'phra yang
de tshe 'ga' zhig dag ni rgyab kyis phyogs ma gyur
de tshe rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la ni 'ga'dga'
gnyen la zhe sa med min mi sterster/stenggter ba yang med
brtul zhugs med pa nyid min rdzunbrdzun med 'tshe med pa

sgra mi bsgrags kyi sras po
lta bu byung bar gyur
der yang skyed mos tshal dang lha gnas dka' thub gnas
khron pa rdzing dang dge bcu 'du ba'i gnas rnams kyi
bya ba rnams ni mtho ris bzhin du nyer thob nas
chos 'dod rnams kyiskyi mngon sum du ni rab tu mdzadmjad
mu ge dang ni 'jigs dang nad rnams las grol zhing
dgar gyur skye bo mtho ris *bzhingzhan du mngon par dga'
bdag *posmos bdag *mopo la 'am mo yis bdag por rung
phan tshun log par mngon par spyod pa dag kyang med

dga' ba'i ched du 'dod la 'ga' zhig
gis ma bsnyen
'dod pa'i don du nor ni 'ga' zhig gis ma bsrungs
nor gyi don du chos la 'ga' zhig gis ma spyad
chos kyi ched du tshe'tshe ba 'ga' zhig gis ma byas
rkun po sogs dang dgra yang nyams par rang gnas temed

pha rol mya ngan med pa ji lta ba
nyid bzhin
rang gi 'khor lo pha rol 'khor lo las grolgol te
rgyal po de la bde dang lo legs byung bar gyur

de yi tshe na rgyal po
de yi rgyal srid la
de skyes pa na nyi ma'i sras po'i yid shes bzhin
dga' bar spyad par gyur la sdig pa rab nyams shing
chos rnams 'bar zhing nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar gyur
gang phyir rnam pa de ltar don kun grub pa dang
rgyal po'i rigs kyi phun sum tshogs pa byung gyur te
de phyir mi skyong gis ni sras po de yi mtshan
don kun grub pa zhes bya 'di ni rab tu mdzad
lha mo sgyu ma yang ni lhala yi drang srongsong mtshungs
bu yi nus mthu rnam par spangs pa mthong nas ni
bltams la rab tu dga' mas bzod par ma nus te
de nas gnas pa'i *phyirphyedched/chid du lharltar ni gshegs par gyur
de nas lha yi mngal dang mtshungs pa'i gzhon nu la
byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyanggyang khyad par med pa yi
ma yi nu mo mdangs mnyam pa yi rang bzhin la
yang dag skyed *bcugbtsudbtsud/btsung bdag las skyes pa lta bur gyur
de nas nyi ma gzhon nu 'char rir gnas 'dra dang
rlung gis rab tu budbus par gyur pa'i me bzhin dang
skar ma'i bdag po mun min phyogs la gnas pa ltar
gzhon nu de ni rim gyis yang dag 'phel bar gyur

de nas ringrin thang chen po'i tsan dantsa ndan
rnams dang ni
rin chen 'phrengphreng ba sman gyi snying por bcas rnams dang
ri dagsdwags rab tu sbyar ba'i gser gyi shing rta dangrnams
'di yi ched du *bshesgshegs kyi khyim rnams dag nas blangs
lang tshe nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams dang

gser
gyi rang bzhin ri dags glang chen rta rnams dang

gser dang dngul
gyis bris pa'i mi chung gzugs rnams dang
shing rta ba glang byung dus yang dag sbyar rnams blangs

de ni
lang tsho rjes mthun yul la nye spyod pa
de rnams kyis ni yul la nyer spyad la
dpaldpa' dang brtan pa yis dang blo dang dpal gyis kyang
byis pa yin yang byis min rab mtshungs byung bar gyur
lang tsho gzhon nu shin tu 'das nas yang dag par
'du byed las ni rab tu thob nas dus su ni
lo mang dag gis rtogs bya nyin zhag nyung ngu yis
rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rig pa rnams ni blangs
drang srong chen po dkar min las ni sngon rol dutu
de yiyis nyesnyes legs don gyi skal ba thosthob nas ni
nags su gshegs par 'gyur zhes shākya'i rgyal po yis
'dod pa rnams la chagschag pa bskyedskyed du bcug par gyur
brtan pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa spyancan gyi rigs de lasla
ngo tsha dang ni dul ba nyer ldan legs ldan ma
grags 'dzin ma zhes grags pa rnam par yangs pa ma
btsun mor mngon par brjod pa'i dpal mo 'di la blangs
kun *byed'gyed gzhon nu dang ni rab tu mtshungsmchungs pa yisyis
mchog gi lus kyiskyi snang zhing gsal ba de nyid ni
shākya'i rgyal po'i mna' ma de dang thabs gcigcig tu
bde sogs ma dang mig stong ldan bzhin mngon par dga'
yid kyang *skyodspyoddpyod par byed la cung zhig rab loglogs pa
gang gisgi mthong mi 'gyur zhes rjes su bsams byas nas

sa la rab tu spyod min lding khang lto nyid
du
gnas dag mi skyong gis ni de la rnam par bstan
de nas gzhal med nam mkharnamkhar sa la spyod pa bzhin
ston ka'ikha'i dus kyi chu *stergter sprin ni dkar po yiyis
dus sbyor kun tudu bde ba'i gzhi yi lding khang la

bud med rnams kyi sil snyan rgya chen rnams kyiskyi rnam
par gshegs

gser gyis *bsdamsgdams pa'i rnga
shing can gyi rdza rnga'i skad
mi mo'i lag pa'i rtsertsa mos mngon par brdungs pa yi
lha mchog ma yi gar dang mnyam pa'i gar rnams kyis
ti se'i gangs ltar de yi pho brangbang mdzes par gyur
ngag dang bzogzo dang rol dang rnam 'gyur rnams kyis kyang
rgyags dang rtse dang rgoddgod pa dngar mo rnams kyis dang
smin ma bskyod pa yisyid dang phyed migmag lta rnams kyis

de la
der ni mi mo rnams ni dga' bar gyur
de nas de ni 'dod pa *rtenbrtenbsten par mkhas pa yisyi
dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams kyis bzung gyur la
gzhal med khang *gini rgyab nas bsod nams las can bzhin
gzhal med khang gini rgyab nas sa la ma gshegs sogshegso
mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni
de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul gyur te
sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing
legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur
brtan min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bde laba ma zhen la
ma rungs bskyed ma la ni yang dag chags ma gyur
brtan pas dbang po'iba'i rta nina *stabsstobs las rnam thul zhing
*gzhengnyen dang grong khyer pa rnams yon tan rnams kyis rgyal

gzhan gyi
sdug bsngal phir ni rig pa ma brjod la
ye shesya shas dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjodbrjad
des ni rang gi skye dgu rnams la ji lta bar
de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad
skar ma rgyal snang shes*shel ldan sras po lhag pa'i lha
ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod dedes
chung min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur la
gnyis skyes rnams la gser dang ba lang rnams kyang byinbyan

div.note: nach S. 296, Anm. 2, doch shes zu lesen

lg.l: 'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang yon tanyton chab rnams kyis
gtsang sbra'isgra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te
rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chang rnams dang

zhi ba bdag
skyes snying la zhi ba'i bde la 'thungs'thung
gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi ba ma smras la
gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjod de
zhi ba de nyid med dangmedang (4) rtsub pa'i de nyid phyir

ngo tsha ba yis bdag nyid
khokha na brjod ma nus
don ldan 'dod pa rnams dang mi 'dod pa rnams la

chags
pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te
dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la
mchod sbyin la yang ma mos de ltar ji lta bzhin

sred pa dang ldan mngon
par 'ongs lapa de ma thag
sbyin bya chu 'dra rnams kyiskyi skom pa bcadbcas gyur la
g.yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta rirere/ri yis
dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par gyur'gyur
*bciggcig ni rnam par dul la des ni bdunmdun bsrungs shing
bdun po nyid ni dordon la lnga po dag ni bsrungs
sde tshanmtshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing
sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde tshan gnyis po spangs

nyes pa byas kyang rab tu *bskyabsbskyangs nas
gzhom bya la
'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin
de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la
de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong
drang srong rnams kyikyis mchog gigis brtul zhugs spyad gyur la
yun ringrings yang dag bzung ba'i sha 'khonkhon zhugs rnams dordo
yon tan dri ldan snyan *dagngagdngags rnams ni thob gyur la
dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam parphar dor
rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dpya ni ma blangs la
pha rol dngos po rnams la mngon par rlom ma byas
dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la
khro *boba rnams ni snying gis bzunggzung ba ma yin no
zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab *daddang la
rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar

der
ni de ltar sa bdag rab tu sgyur ba can
'bangs dang grong khyer pa rnams de lta nyid du byas
de nas mdzes *ma'ipa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma
grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi grags pa 'dzin ma la
zas gtsang sras po'i sras po sgra gcan *dgrasgra yi zhal

sgra gcan
'dzin zhes bya ba dus su skyes par gyur
de nas 'dod pa'i bu mnga' mchog gisgi yid ches te
rigs brgyudrgyud 'phel ba rab mtshon sa skyong rgyal po ni
ji lta nyid du sras po rab tu skyes la dga'
de lta nyid du sras po'i sras po skyes la dga'
bdag gi bu yi bur gyur pa la brtse ba ni

bdag
bzhin gang las yin zhes dga' ba skyes gyur te
dus su des ni *chacho ga de dang de dmigs shing
bu la dga' ba mtho ris bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur

rgyal po'i khyu mchog grags dang snyan
pas mtshan rnams kyiskyis
dang po'i bskalskal ba rnams kyi lam la gnas nas ni
dkar po ma dor dka' thub rnams la dka' thub dang
'tshe ba dor ba'i mchod sbyin rnams kyiskyi mchod par gyur
rgyal po'i dpal gyis dang ni dka' thub dpal gyis kyang
bsod nams las can de ni de nas 'bar gyur la
rigs dang blo dang mdzad spyod kyiskyis kyang gsal ba ste
gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro

div.note: a: rgyal po'i dpal gyis dang ni dka' thub dpal gyis kyang (2) minute scriptum G.

lg.l: rang byung las byung mchod byed sngags ni mchod byas nas
sras gnasnas ched du brtan pa'i dpal gyis bzlas byas shing
dka' thub byed pa'i las rnams byas gyur skye dgu rnams
skyed 'dod skye dgu'i bdag bzhin dang po'i dus su'o
mtshon cha spangs shing bstan bcos rnam par shes gyur la
nye bar zhi la bsnyen zhing ngesdes la rnam par bzod
dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la
yab mesmed bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur
des kyang bu yi ched du rgyal srid bzung gyur la
bu ni rigs kyi don du rigs ni grags pa'i phyir
grags pa mtho ris ched du mtho ris bdag nyid phyir
chos kyi don du bdag nyid gnas la 'dod par 'gyur'gyur
de ltar des ni dam pa rnams kyis nges thob pa'i

thos pa las grub chos ni rnam pa
sna tshogs byas
gang las bdag gi bus ni bu yi ngo mthong nas
nags tshal nyid du 'gro mi 'gyur zhes mgon bslangs so
bdag la yang dag gnasblangs pa'i dpal ni bsrungbsrungssrung 'dod pa'i
sa skyong rnams kyis sa la bu ni bsrung ba ste
chos ni 'dod pa'i *mima yi dbang po de yis kyang
yul rnams 'dor ba med par bu ni chos las bsrungs
byang chub sems dpa' yul la bde ba'i ro sheszhes thams cad kyang
sragssras bskyedskyed pa na dpe med sems dpa'pa nags su gshegsnagsu gsheḍ gyur te
de phyir nye bar bsags pa'i las ni rtsa nas bskyedskyed pa'i phyir
de ni zhi ba ma thob de srid dga' ba bsnyen par gyur

div.p:
| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya
ba'iba snyan dngags chen po las | btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ||

lg.l: de nas re zhig dus nasna 'jam po'i rtswartsa rnams dang
khu byugbyugs pho ni gyen du skadskang 'don rkang 'thung rnams
glu rnams dang ni nges ldan skyed mos tshal rnams ni
padma'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan desnges ni thos par gyur
de nas bud med skye bo rnams ni dga' ba yi
grong khyer skyedskyeng/skyed mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thoszos/thos te
khyim gigyi nang du mngon par bkag pa'i *kluglu bzhin du
phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do
de nas sras su*bu mngon brjod yid 'ong de yi ni
dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni nges par thos gyur nas
brtse ba'i phun sum tshogs pas lang tshor 'ongs pa ru

ltad
mo dag la rnam par gshegs par bka' stsal to
gzhon nu shin tu gzhon nu'i sems dang ldan pa ni
yang dag skyo ba'i sems susemsu ma gyur zhes sems shingzhing
nyam thag tha dad skye bo kun nas 'dus pa ni
rgyal po'i lam du phyir la rnam par bzlogsbzlogzlog pa ste
nying lag dman pa rnams dang dbang po ma tshang rnams

'khogs'khog pa nad pa la sogssogs
bkren rnams phyogs rnams su
de nas mchog tu zhi bas yang dag rab *btonston nas
rgyal po'i lam rnams dag ni mchog tu mdzes par byas
de nas dpal ldan rgyal po'i lam ni byas pa na
dpal ldan rnam par dul ba rjes 'brang'brangs gzhon nu ni
gzhal yas khang pa'i logs nas dus su mngon babs nas
mngon par rjes gnang byas pa mi skyong la mngon gshegs
de nas mi dbang bu la mchi ma byung gyur te
mgo la nye bar bsnomsbsnams te yun ringrings rnam gzigs nas
song zhigcig ces ni tshig gisgi bka' dag bstsalstsal gyur la
brtse ba dag las de ni yid kyis ma btang ngo
de nas de ni 'dzam bu chu gser sga 'dzin pa'i
legs par bslabs pa'i mgyogs 'gro *ba'ibzhi yis sbyar ba yi
dbang po ma nyams mkhas shing *gcanggtsang la 'od zer 'chang
gser gyi rang bzhin shing rta la ni yang dag 'dzegs

div.note: a: Vor dieser Zeile liest G: da nas [= 8a] da na [= 8a/7d] yad kyas ma btang nga [= 7d] |, was jedoch durch Pünktchen auf der oberen Vokallinie getilgt wurde.

lg.l: de nas 'bras spos me tog 'bar ba rab bkram zhingshing

phreng ba
rnam dpyangs rab tu
g.yo ba'i ba dan can
zla ba skar ma dang bcas bar snang la bzhin du
'brang'dra ba rjes 'brang lam ni rab tu thob par gyur
ya mtshan gyur las rab tu rgyas pa'i mig rnams ni
u-tpal sngon po'i phyed 'dra rnams kyis bkram pa ni
rgyal po'i lam la dal buom. dal bus gshegs gyur te
grong khyer skye bo rnams kyis kun nas mngon par dga'
kha cig de la zhi ba'i yon tan gyis bstod la

kha

dka' thub nagsnags (5) su gshegs pa mdog nyams snang ba na
mgyogs 'gro 'chang de phyag rgyas gyen du bskyodbskyong byas nas
shin tu rnam par ngu zhing sa la 'gyel gyur to
rnam par bltas nas slar yang sgra bcas par ngu zhing
bsngags ldan rta la lag pa dag gis nyer 'khyud nas
de nas kho chad yang dang yang du zlos bzhin du

lus kyiskyi
song bar gyur kyang sems kyis ma yin noyino
la lar rab tu sems shingzhing la lar rnam par ngu
la lar sa la rab tu 'brad cing la lar 'gyel

de nas
'gro bzhin gus pa'i dbang gisgi sdug bsngal zhing
dbang med lam na bya ba mang po byas pa'o

div.p: | sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | bsngagssngags ldan phyir la bzlogbzlogsldog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ||

lg.l: de nas 'dun po ngu zhing gdong ni mchi ma can
bzlogsbzlog nas nags su 'dun pa'i dka' thub chags med pa
don kun grub paspa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas
dka' thub gnas dete grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob
de nas ri dags rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de
ri dags gnas der ri dags bzhin du rab zhugs pa
phun tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis
dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig dag phrogs par gyur
khur ldan rnams bzhin mgo boom. rnams ni phyed btuddud pas
lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan lasla
de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa
dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur roto
sbyin sreg bud shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyin nas
me tog lo 'dab thobrgyas pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams
dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang
gshegs pa mthong ste klog grwargrarglar song bar ma gyur to
chu stergter sngon po bzhin du mthong nas rma bya rnams
dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la
rgya skyegsskyags ri dags spyod ldan rnams dang ri dags rnams
'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur

'od zer ldan pa shar ba lta
bur 'bar ba yiyis
bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas

sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na
yang
rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to
'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin nam ci
tha skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes
de mthong ba lasla ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi
thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs par gyur
lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang
'jig rten rgyu dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang
gang 'dod pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba
des ni nags tshal mtha' dag rab tu snang bar mdzadmdzod
de nas gdung gnas pa de rnams kyiskyi ji lta bzhin
nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par mchod gyur la
de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni
chos 'dzin rnams la slarslang yang rab tu mchod par gyur
de nas rnam par thar bzhedbzhes brtan pa de yis ni
dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing
mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye boba yis
khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas der rjes su sbyaddpyad par gyur
dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der
dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni desngesnges/des gsan nas
rjes su gshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la
zhezhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzhed 'di gsungs sogsungso
gang phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa
bdag gigis dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o

de phyir khyod kyis bdag la smra bar 'os yinmin
te
nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o
de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes des
shākya'i khyu mchog khyu mchogom. rnam par gnon pa po
de la rim gyis dka' thub khyad par rnams dang ni |om.
| dka' thubom. 'bras bu dang bcas gtamgtam/gtem/gtim dag byas pa'o
grong byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i

'dab ma rnams dang
chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid
thub pa rnams kyi spyod pa 'di ni lung ji ltar
dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o
kha cig ri dags bzhin du rtswa rnams la spyod dela
gzhan rnams bor ba yis ni mkha' la rgyu ba'iba' bya ltar 'tsho
kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste

grog mkhar gyur pa
rnams ni nags na rlung gis so
rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrubsbsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te
kha cig rang gi so yis nye bar blangs shing za
de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyigyis don du btsosbcos byas nas
gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o
chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'iral ba'i / ngal ba'i tshogs can kha cig ni
gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing
kha cig nya dang mnyam par chu la rnam zhugs nas
rus sbal bzhin du lus rnams rab tu skumsbskum pa'o
de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub snanags tshogs kyi
mchog gis lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten te
sdug bsngal lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang
chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsungsgsung phyir ro
de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis
dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas

de nyid gzigs pa min yang ngomngoms par ma gyur
la
bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur
sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa du ma ste
dka' thub dagbdag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o
'jig rten thams cad yongs suyongsu 'gyur ba dang ldan la
nyung ngudu la ngal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o
'phangsphangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni
gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la
de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la
slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no

lus kyi ngal dub gdung ba'i
bya ba rnams kyis ni
'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o
'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongs suyongsu mami rtogsrtog par
sdug bsngal gyis desde sdug bsngal kho na rjes su 'tsholtshol
'chi lasbas skye dgu rnams kyikyis rtag par 'jigs pa ste
'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod
rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste
'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs pa'jigspa rnamrnams lhung ngo
'di yi don du gcig rnams ngal bar rab 'jug cing
gzhan rnams mtho ris don du ngal ba 'thob pa ste
bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa don ma byas
gson pa'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung

gang zhig dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags
'gro ba can
'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la
shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongs suyongsu gdung ba yis
bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o

lus kyi gtsergtser/gcer bas gal te
'dir ni chos yin na
lus kyi bde ba choschod ma yin par 'gyur ba ste
pha rol tudu ni bde ba chos kyis kyang thob'thob la
de'ide phyir 'di yiyis chos kyiskyi chos min 'bras bu'o
gang gigis phyir na bsambsams pa'i dbang gis lus yin la
rab tu 'jug pa dang ni ldogzlog pa dang yangdag kyang ngo
de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rigs pa ste
sems las gzhan pa'i lus ni shing dang mnyammnyas pa'o
bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni
de phyir ri dags rnams kyang bsod nams yod pa ste
phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las
skal ba'ibskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so
bsod nams phyir ni sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na
'o na sdug labsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min

lg.l:
de ltar gang dag
las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir
stegs sheszhes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed
derde yang de yi snying la tshim pa tsam yin te
chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin phyir
yon tan ldan pas regrig pa'i chu ni gang dang gang
de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na
chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste
de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go
de ltar rigsrig pa mang po ldan pa de dang de
smras te rnam par mdzes pa'i nyi ma nub par gyur
de nas sbyin sreg du bas kha dog 'gyur ba'i shing
dka' thub rab tu zhi ba'i khrus sar rnam par zhugs

mngon par bton pa'i rab tu 'bar ba'i me yiyis thab
lathal ba ni
dbang bskur byas pa'i drang srong skye bos khyab pa ste
bzlas pa bya yibya'i dbyangs kyis kun nas skad sgrogssgrog lha yi tshogs
chos kyi lam gyi las kyi mtha' bzhin rab tu zhugs pa'o
de ni mtshan mo thang 'ga' mtshan mor byed 'od kyi
dka' thub rnams la yongs suyongsu rtog cing zhugs gyur la
dka' thub thams cad yongs suyongsu brtags shing mkhyen gyur nasna
dka' thub zhing gi thang de las nina/ni gshegs par gyur
de'i gzugs bdag nyid chen por song ba'i yid rnams kyis

dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni de nas deom.
rjes gshegsgshegs
'phags min sdig pa rnams kyis zil non yul las ni
drang srong chen po rnams ni chos bzhin pha rol gshegs
de nas ral pa shing shun zur phud kyis rol pa'iba'i
dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de rnams des gzigs shing
de dag rnams kyikyis dka' thub rnams la rjesbrjes brten te
dpal dang ldan la dge ba'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas
de nas dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas
mi mchog de la yongs suyongsu bskor nas gnas gyur la

de dag rnams kyi rganrgyan pos mchod ma
sngon btang ste
dus kyi zhi bas tshig 'di rab tu 'di smras so
khyod kyikyis byon tshe gdung gnas gang ba bzhin gyur la
rab tu gshegs tshe stong paba bzhin du rab tu thob
de phyir brtse ba 'di ni 'bor bar 'os min te
'tsho bar 'dod pa'i phangs pa'i tshe yis lus bzhin no
lha yi drang srong tshangs pa'i drang srong rgyal po yiyis
drang srong gis bsnyen bsodbsed/bsod nams nye bar gangsgang ldan niri

dka'
thub nor ldan rnams kyi dka' thub de rnams ni
gang gi nye logs dag nas mang por 'gyur ba'o
de bzhin kun nas bsod nams dag gi stegs gyur la
nam mkha'inamkha'i 'og gi them skas dag tu gyur pa ste
lha yi drang srong rnams dang drang srong chen po ni
chos kyi bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsnyenbrnyen
'di nas slar yang khyad 'phags chos kyi che las ni
byang gi phyogs nyid kho nar bsnyen par nus pa ste
blo dang ldan pas gom pa gcig tu 'gyur bagyur ba yang
lho yi phyogs suphyogsu 'gro bar nus pa ma yin no
dka' thub nags 'dir ji ste bya ba ngan pa'am
bsre ma'i chos bsamsam lhung ba min nam mi gtsang bar
khyod kyis mthong ste gang gis khyed kyi'di bzhugs 'dod min
de ni gsung la re zhig sred par bzhugs mdzod cig
dka' thub gter dang rab tu mtshungs par gyur pa lalas
'di rnams kyis ni dka' thub grogs su 'dod pa ste
dbang po dang mnyam khyed dang lhan gcigcig gnas pa ni
phur bu yi yang mngon par mthomthong ba 'dren pa yin
dka' thub ldan pa'i gtso bos de skad ces smras te
srid parpa rab tu nyams phyir dam bca' byas pa yiyis
mkhas pa'i gtso bo des ni dka' thub ldan dbus su
nang du song ba'i rang bzhin smras par gyur pa'o

'gronmgron
la sdug
cing rang gi skye bo dang mtshungs pa'i
drang po'i bdag nyid chos 'dzin thub pa rnams kyikyis ni
bdag la rnam pa de ltar bsam pa skyes pa yis
bdag gigis dga' ba mchog dang bkur sti skyes par gyur

mdor
bsdus gyur na brtse zhing gnyenbsnyen pa 'di rnams dag
snying la song ba'i ngag rnams dag gis khrus byas bzhin
kun nas 'dzin med chos can bdag gi dga' ba ni
de ring slar yang cung zhig g.yos par gyur pa nyid
de ltar rab tu zhugs pa'i khyed cag skyabs 'os rnams
shin tu phyogs su lhung ba yang dag bstan pa rnams
bor nas 'gro zhes kho bo yi yang sdug bsngal te
ji ltar gnen 'dun rnams ni spangs pa de ltar roltaro
khyed cag rnams kyi chos 'di mtho ris ched du ste
bdag gi mngon par mtho babar yang srid ma yin phyir
nags der gang gisgi bdag ni sdod 'dod ma yin te
chos las ldog pa rab tu 'jug pa tha dad phyir
de phyir nags 'di dag nasna gang gis yongs 'gro ba
bdag gi ma dga' ma yin phapa/pha rol spyod log min
sngon gyi dus na rjes mthun chos la gnas pa yi
drang srong chen po thams cad rnams dang mtshungs par gyur
de nasnas don dang ldan pala bde zhing yid du 'ong
legs mthun mdangs dang ldan la snying po dang ldan pa
gzhon nu'i tshig ni dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis
thos nas khyad 'phags dang ldan bkur sti mang pos gshegs
de nas gnyis skyes thal ba la nyal kha cig ni
lus ring gtsug tor dang ldan shing shun gos gyongon zhing
mig ni cung zad dkardmar ser sna ni phra la ringrings
lag gcig spyisbyi blugs ldan pas tshig 'di smras pa'o
khyod kyikyis nges pa nyid du rgya chen blo ldan zhing

gzhon nu khyodkhyed kyiskyi skye ba la ni
nyes pa gzigs

mtho ris dang niom. thar bathar panyes pa yang dag rnam
spyod phyir
thar bapapa/ba gang gi blo gros yod pa de yin no
mchod sbyin dka' thub nges pa de dangom. de rnams kyis
chags pa dang ldan mtho ris la ni 'gro bar 'dod
dgra bo bzhin du chags dang lhan cig g.yul spyadspyad/sbyadsbrad nas
sems pa dangrang ldan thar bapa duru ni 'gro bar 'dod
de phyir gal te khyod kyi blo gros 'di nges na

skyen par khyed nyid 'bigs byed phug par gshegs mdzod
cig
gang zhig mthar thug nges par legs pa thob pa'i mig
thub pa 'di ni de ru mtshan mo min papar gnas
de phyir khyod kyis de nyid lam ni thosthob gyur'gyur la
sred par gyur na yang dag rab tu 'thob parthob 'gyur
bdag gisgis mthong ba ji ltar blo gros de de ltar
de nyid kyi yang blo gros bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur
gsal zhing mtho ba'i shangs dang rnam rgyas yangs pa'i spyan
zangs mdog ya mchu ma mchu rno dkar mche ba can
ljags ni dmar zhing phra ba'i zhal dang ldan pa 'di
shes bya'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag la ni 'gro ba nyid
khyod kyi zab pa dang ni gting dpag dka' gang dang
gang zhig sgron ma nyid dang mtshan rnams gang yin pas
sngon gyi bskal par drang srong gis gangkyang ma mthong ba'i
slob dpon nyid de sa la
mngon parmngon par (6) dga' nas gshegs
dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang de la yang
cho ga bzhin rjes byas nas dka' thub nags der gshegs

div.p:
| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | | dka' thub kyigyi nags sunagsu zhugs
pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ||

lg.l: de nas mgyogs 'gro spyod de yid mi bde gyur te
de ltar jo bo nags su nga med par gshegs la
lam du mya ngan med pa 'bad parpa byas gyur te
de ltarlta na yang de yide'i mchi ma khobkhogkhogs ma gyur
gang la jo bo'i bka' lasla mtshan mo gcig gis ni

mgyogs 'gro de dang gshegs
par gyur pa'i lam
lam de nyid la 'gro zhagbzhag dag ni brgyad rnams kyis
jo bo nyid dang bral ba de yis sems shingzhing 'ongs'ong

div.note: vielleicht Tilgungszeichen über b-

lg.l: 'thon pa med pas rgyags pa med par gyur pa yiyis
bsngagssngags ldan mgyogs 'gro nyid kyang mdangs med rgyu ba ste
de ltar rgyan de rnams kyis brgyan par byas na yang
de yis dor bas dpal ni song ba bzhin du gyur
phyir log nas kyang dka' thub nags su mngon phyogs te
snying rje bar ni yang dang yang du drag tu 'tsher
lam na ltogsrtogs pa ldan pa yin yang 'bru 'amdang chu
ji ltar sngon bzhin mngon par ma dga' ma bslangs sobslangso
de nas 'gro la phan pa'i bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po desdes
ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer rnam par dman pa la
nyin mor byed pas borbor/bong ba'i nam mkha'namkha' 'bras med bzhin

rim gyis de gnyis
stong pa bzhin du nye bar song
padma dkar po dang bcas chu yis mdzes gyur cingzhing
me tog 'dzin pa'i shing rnams kyis ni brgyan napa yang
grong khyer pa rnams rab tu dga' ba song gyur te
de yi nye ba'i nags de nags ltar mdzes ma gyur
de ltar lta byed mchi mas bcom pa'i mi rnams ni
rab tu 'bar min zhan pa'i yid kyis phyogs su skor
'ong du mi ster ba bzhin gnyis po de grong du
dal bus log pa'i khrus bzhin mngon par song bar gyur
shākya'i rigs kyi drang srong dang bral 'ongs pa yiyis
lus zags 'gros dang ldan pa de gnyis mthong nas kyang
sngon tshe shing rta bcu ba'ipa'i shing rta 'ongs pa bzhin
grong khyer skye bo rnams ni lam du mchi ma phyung
de nas mya ngan nye bar ldan pa'i skye bo dag
mchi ma phyungbyungchung ba rnams kyis 'dunbdun pa la smras pa
grong khyer yul 'khor dga' mdzad rgyal po'i sras po de
khyodkhyed kyis gang du bor zhes rgyab nas rjes su 'gro
de nas gus ldan skye bo de la des smras pa
mi dbang sras po bdag gis yongs suyongsu bor ba min
ngu bzhin skye bo meded pa'i nags sunagsu kho bo dang
khyim gnasbdag cha lugs dag kyang de yis rnam par spangs
de yi tshig ni skyed poskye bo de rnams kyis thos nas
nges par shin tu dka' ba nyid ces nges par song gyur la
'gyel zhing mig skyes chu ni rnam par 'thormthor ba ste
yid la smadsmod cing bdag nyid kyi nakyis ni 'bras bu long
de nas smras pa gnyis skyes rgyal po'i shugs mnga' ste
gang du gshegs pa'i nags der dedi ring zhugs par bgyi
lus can dbang po ma tshang rnams kyi ji lta bar
de dangdag bral bas bdag cag 'tsho'tsho/'cho'tshe bar 'dod pa med
de dang bral ba'i grong khyer 'di ni nags yin la
de dang yang dag ldan pa'i nags de grong khyer yin
lha ni lha min gsod tshe brgya byin gyis ji ltar
de dangdag bral bas bdag gi grong khyer mdzes mamar gyur

de nas
slar yang gzhon nu phyir la loglogs ces te
yan lag ma rnams dkarskar khung phreng rnams rab thob ste
mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab ni rnam par dbyendben paba mthong gyur nas
slar yang dkarskar khung rnams ni rnam par bkag nas ngungu/du
brtul zhugs dang ni mya ngan dag gis yid du bcirdu bcingdub cing / du bcing

brtul zhugs la rab zhugs
pas sras po nyer thob phyir
bzlas byas shing gi lha yi khang par mi bdag gis
bsam pa ji ltar bya baom. de dang de rnams byas
de nas mig dag mchi mas rab tu gang ba des
mgyogs 'gro blangs nas mgyogs 'gro rjes su 'gro ba ste
g.yul 'gyed pa na dgra bos jo bo khyer ba ltar
mya ngan dag gis mngon bcom mi skyong khang par zhugs
mi dbang rgyal po'i khab tu rnam par zhugs pa na
rnam par ltablta zhing mig dag mchi ma 'bab pa yis
skye bo la ni sdug bsngal rab tu rtogs 'jug bzhin

bsngagssngags ldan
mgyogs 'gro bsalgsal ba'i dbyangs kyis ngus par gyur
de nas khang pa'i dbus na spyod pa'i bya rnams dang
nye bar btagsbrtagsbrtag pa'i mgyogs 'gro dam par byed rnams kyis
mi dbang sras po log par gshegs la the tshom ste
mgyogs 'gro de yi dbyangs la so sor ram 'degs byas
ji ltar bsngagssngags ldan mgyogs 'gro 'tsher bar byed pa ste
nges par gzhon nu khab tu rnam par zhugs snyam ste
dga' ba phul du byung bas bslus pa'i skye bo rnams
skye bo'i bdag po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs sosong
shin tu dga' ba las ni mya ngan gyis brgyal rnams
gzhon nu blta ba la ni g.yo ba'i spyan pama rnams
ston ka'i chu stergter sprin las glog ni g.yo ba bzhin
bud med rnams ni sred pas khyim nas phyir la 'thon
lan bu rnam par 'phyang zhing dar gos dri ma can
mig rtsi dang bral mchi mas mig bcom gdong rnams kyis
mtshan mo zad tshe skya regs gisrengs kyisreng gisreng gis mkhar skar ma bzhin
byi dor dang bral bud med rigsrid rnams mdzes ma gyur
rkang pa rkang gdub dang bral zangs mdog ma chags rnams
gdong pa rna lung dang bral mgrin pa drang po rnams
rang bzhin gyis rgyas brla ni 'og pagphabphab/pab dang bral rnams
nu ma do shal dang bral stod g.yogs tshangtshadchad rnams sornamso
rten dang bral ba'i 'dun pa dang ni mgyogs 'gro nyid
mig ni mchi ma dang ldan de rnams kyis mthong nas
nags mthar khyu mchog dang bral ba glang rnams bzhin du
sems 'khralkhral gdong ldan yan lag mchog ma rnams ni ngusngus/dus
de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo mchi ma dang bcas par
be'u nyams pa'i ma he mo ltar mnyes bshingshin ma
gser gyi chu shing lo 'dab rnam par g.yo ba bzhin
gau tam masta ma mas ni lag pa rab turabom. bzung nas 'gyel
dpung pa lag pa snyoms shingmnyam zhing gzi brjid bcom pa yiyis
bud med gzhan rnams yid mi bde bas sems med bzhin
mchi ma ma bton 'o dod 'bod min dbugs med par
g.yo bral ri mo bris pa bzhin du gnas par gyur

brtan yinmin bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgalbrgyal bud
med gzhan
rnam par lta byed nas 'bab rgyun gyi gtong rnams kyis
sa 'dzin ri bo nas 'bab rgyudrgyun kyisgyigyis rdo ba ltar
tsan dantsa-ndan rab bskudbskus nu ma rnams la rnam par 'thor
de rnams kyikyis ni mig chus brdegs btagsbtab pa'i gdonggdon rnams kyis
rgyal po'i khangkhab de de tshe mdzes par gyur pa ni
chu gsar dus na chu stergter char gyis brdegsbtagsbtab pa yi
chu 'dzin padma rnams kyis rdzing bu ji ltar ro
rgyas shing bar med legs par zlum pa'i sor mo can
rgyan bral rtsa mi mngon pa'i yan lag mchog ma rnams
rlung gis g.yos pa'i ljon shing rang gi 'dab mas ltar
padma lta bu'i lag pa rnams kyis brang rnams brdungs
nags rlung gis bsgulbsgulsgul padma lta bur g.yos pa yiyis
ngang pa rnams kyi 'khrig'khrigs pa rnams kyiskyi chu klung ltar
brang brdungs rab bskyod 'brel mtho'i nu ma rnams kyis ni
de lta na yang mi mo de rnams mdzes par gyur
ji ltar brang rnams la ni lag pas zug byas pa
de ltar lag pa rnams la brang ni zug byed cing
le lo can ma brtse med stobs med ma yisyas der
lag pa'i rtse dang brang rnams phanpan/phan tshung zug byas sobyaso
de nas khros pas rab tu dmar ba'i sbyan ldan ma
sems 'khralkhral gyis sbrel mgrin pa kha zhing ldab ldib dang

mya ngan mchi ma 'dzin pa'i grags 'dzin mas smras pa

'dun papa/baba 'dod pa'i
shing rta
de ni gang du thal
gsum po mnyam du song la khyod dang bsngagssngags ldan ni
nye bar 'ongs pas kho mo'i yid ni g.yos par gyur | 8.32
kho mo 'phags min brtse min bshes ma yin pa'i las
phul phyung de 'dir byas nas da ni ci la ngu
mchi ma ma 'don khyod kyi sems ni sim par 'gyur

dga' dang dbang duom. song dang phan dang legs pa dang

'di yi rigs kyi nye bar nub pa chen po byas

bdag gi 'di ltar 'di nas
nor rdzas thams cadcad stor
mgyogs 'gro 'dis ni mda' yi rma srol byung rnams kyang
sron par nus sheszhes grags na lcaglcags rnams smos ci dgos
bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i dpal ni blangs gyur nas
'dis ni lcaglcags lhung 'jigs lasla 'ongsong ba yin nam ci
mi dbang pho brang yongs suyongsu gang ba bzhin du ni
'phags pa min las da ltarlta drag tu 'tsher bar byed
gang gi tshe na bdag gi dga' ba phyi rol gshegs |om.
| de yi tshe naom. mgyogs 'gro lkugslgugs/lkugs la thang chad gyur
gal te skye bo dag la go bar 'tsher byed dam
yang na rmig pas sa la rmig pa'i sgra byed dam
yang na 'gram pa'i sgra ni mchog tu bskyedbskyod na ni
bdag la sdug bsngal 'di 'dra 'byung ba ma yin noyino
de ltar 'dir ni lha mo'i smre sngags la brten cingzhing
mchi mas mdud'dud pa yi ge'i tshigchig dag thos gyur nas
'og tu gdong phyogs mchi ma dang bcas thalthel sbyar te
'dun pas lan 'di dal busbur smras par gyur pa'o
lha mo bsngags ldan la ni smod par 'os min zhing
kho bo la yang khro bar mdzad pa 'os ma yin
kho bo cag gi skyon min lha mamo mkhyen par mdzod
mi yi lha de lha bzhin bkra shis kun gyis gshegs

bdag gisgi rgyal po'i bstanbrtan parpa
shes pa yin na yang
lha nyid gang dag gis ni stobs las byas pa bzhin
bdag gis mgyogs 'gro 'di ni nye bar 'ongs pa stede

mgyogs 'gro mchog 'di nyid kyang gshegs tshe sa la ni
bar snang dag nala bzung bzhin rmigrmigs pas ma reg cing

de bzhin lha yi ched du gdong ni
sdomssngogs byas bzhin
'gram pa'i sgra ni byas min 'tsher'r ba dag kyang med
gang las sa skyong bdag nyid skyes pa gshegs pagshegspa na
de tshe sgo ni rang nyid bye bar gyur pa ste
mtshan mo'i mun pa nyi mas bzhin du bsal gyur te
de yide'i phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung gishig
gang phyir mi dbang bka' las skye bo stong phrag dag
khang pa dang ni grong khyer nyid du bag yod kyang
de tshe de ni gnyid kyiskyi phrogs shing ma sad de
de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung zhigzhingshig
gang phyir nags na gnas la mthun pa'i gos dag ni
lha na gnas pas dus su 'di la byin gyur la
rgyan dag mkha' la rab tu gtor ba de khyerphyir te
de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zungbzung gishig
de phyir de ltar lha mo nged gnyis la skyon du
ji ltar song ba de la rtog par 'os ma yin
mgyogs 'gro 'di dang bdag gi 'dod pa mi mdzad par
de ni lha rnams dag gis rjes 'gro byas shing gshegs
de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yiyis rab gshegs pa
lha yi mtshar marmang bud med de rnams kyis thos nas
rab tu gshegs las yid la 'bar ba yang thob'thob ste
mya ngan rab tu nyams bzhin ngo mtharmtshar ldan par thal
de nas yid mi bde bas yongs lding mig can ma
phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'ol paba sdug bsngal bzhin

lg.l: rlabs chen dang ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste
so so so sor rtsa ba nas 'khrungs gyen du 'khyil
de yi dbu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni

mi dbang dbu
rgyan la ni yongs suyongsu bkridkri bar 'os
phyag ni rab 'phyang ri dags rgyal po'i stobs mnga' zhing
khyu mchog chen po'i spyan ldan gser 'bar 'od mnga' ba
'brug dang rnga yi sgra ldan sku stod rnam par yangs
de ltar gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os

long bu mi mngon pa-dma'ipad ma'i
rtsa ba ltar 'jam la
dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de dag gis
drang srong rnams kyi nags mtha'i sa la 'gro 'am ci
khangbang bzangbzangs logs na khri dang gdan la 'os pa ste
rin chen na bza' lci min tsan dantsan-dantsa na dan gyis spras shing
de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan pa nags dag tu
granggrang/phrang dang dro dang chu 'ongs'obs'ong/'od rnams su skorbskor ram ci

slong bar ma yin ster ba nyid du mngon 'ongs pa

gsergseng khri dang zhing gzims mal dag la gzimsgzims (5) nas ni
mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gigis rab slobslong paba
gos kyi phyogs gcig bar na sa yi logs la ni
bdag gi dulbrtul zhugs ldan de de ring ji ltar gzims
snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di thos nas
bud med de rnams phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de
ljon shing g.yos paslas me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin
rnam par lta byed dag nas chu dag 'thor ba'o
de nas ngang pa med pa'i ngang mo bzhin du ni

grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyel
gyur la
rnam par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du ldab ldib kyi
skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o
chos dang lhan cig spyod maba/pa mgon med kho mo ni
de yis dor nas gal te chos ni byed 'dod cing
chos dang lhan cig spyod ma dang bral dka' thub gang
yongs suyongsu longs spyodsbyod 'dod 'di'i chos ni ga la zhig
sngon gyi sa skyong rnams des nges par ma thos tethong ste
legs mthong chen po la sogs mes po chen po rnams
bdag po ldan ma dang bcas nags sunagsu gshegs gyur la
kho mo dang bral chos byed 'dod pa de ltar ltos
mchod sbyin du 'am rig byed cho gas 'dus byas shing
pho mo gnyis la dbang bskur de yi 'bras bu ni
gzhan du mnyam por longs spyod 'dod pa ma mthong ste
de nas bdag la 'di yi chos la ser sna skyes
bdag ni yid lanyid la ni sdug dang phan tshun phrag dog cingcing/cir
yang yang rtsodrtsed/rced par chosches dga''ga' des ni nges par shes
khro ba kho mo spangs nas dbang chen 'jig rten du
'jigs med lha mo las ni dga' ba len par 'dod

de la lus kyi yon tan bzung ba'i
btsunbtsun/bcun mo de
ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gigis bsam mno ste
bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas ni
nags su gang phyir des niom. dka' thub rnams la gdung
nges par bdag gi 'dod 'di mtho ris bde phyir min
sems ldan skye bo'i de ni rnyed par dka' ba min
sdug pa des kyang bdag la 'di 'am'di'am gzhan du rung
gang gisgi ma spongspangs zhes ni bdag gi yid la re

gtsang zhing
bzhad pa gyen du blta ba'i skal med na

pha yipha'i pang na yongs suyongsu gnas par nam zhig 'gyur
e ma yidying/yid mnga' 'di yi lus ni shin tu gzhon
yid ni mi rnams kyis bsngags shin tu sra ba ste
ngag gi skad grag rab zloszos dgra yang dga' ba yi
bu ni byis pa 'di 'dra kye ma spongsbong bar byed
bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems yangkyang shin tu sra ba ste
rdo las gyur ram yang na lcags las byas pa 'ampa'am
bder 'os jo bo dpal dor nags su song ba la

bzhin

'grobgro la gzigs nas

g.yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nasnas ni

dga' ba yin yang dga' ba med bzhin nags su bor

yang na derde ni slar yang skyen par khyer la shog
tshabs cher na ba'i sman dang bral bas de bzhin du

rgyal bu gser 'bab 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na

bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na

mchog dang mchog min shesshes pa nyi ma'i sras po yi

yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las minman

sras po nags sunagsu song la gang zhig
lhar song la

phrogs pa'i
dka' thub gnas derder/nger bzang po bdag la smros
de la bdag gi skom pa 'dis ni yongs 'dod de
bdag gi srog ni yi dags 'gro bar 'dod
de ltar sras dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal skyes gyur te
sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtan pa rnam spangs nas
rā ma'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu babapa bzhin
mi skyong 'du shes bral bzhin mang po rnam par labs
de nas de la thos dang dul dang yon tan ldan
rab bgres mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis
mnyam par bzhaggzhag 'di ji lta ba bzhin smras gyur te
yongs su gdunggdong ba'i gdong min mya ngan med pa'ang min
mi mchog brtan pa mya ngan thongmthong la brtan par gshegs
mya ngan bzhin du mchi ma 'don par 'os ma yin
me tog phreng ba rnying bzhin phun tshogs bor nas ni
sa na mi skyong mang po nagsnagsu su shin tu song

gzhan yang
de yi dgongs pa nges pa 'di sngon tshe
drang srong dkar minming de yi tshig ni dran par mdzod
mtho ris su dangyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la

myur bar bka'dka' lung stsol mdzod ji snyidsnyedsnyed/snyeng 'dir 'gro bgyi
sna tshogs rnamstshoḍ rnaṃs kyi khyed kyi om. sras po de yi ni
sna tshogstshoḍ mang po'i 'thab mo de snyedrnyed der byed shog
